name: WK Cook
text: Ordered and arrangement for same day delivery. Never delivered. Called and was told they cancelled order. Why wouldn't you bother calling? Said they sent an email. NEVER AGAIN

name: Jason Shepard
text: Awesome staff and wonderful flower arrangements.

name: Haley Gossett
text: I used them for my wedding. I hired them 8 months before my wedding.  We had agreed on the colors of the flowers & possible substitutions the week prior to go with the theme of our wedding. When it came wedding day, our delivery was made three hours too late, the colors didn’t coordinated with what we discussed, arrangements weren’t made as discussed even with pictures that were emailed to them of what I wanted. We were missing boutonnières & my bridal arrangement ended up only being 2 flowers bigger than the bridesmaids ($120 difference ) The excuse was “it’s not our fault you got married on this weekend” word for word in a text I received from them. Very poor customer service & they will not take responsibility for their slip up.

name: Stacey Williams
text: I’m sad that I can’t post pictures of what I ordered and what I received. I was super disappointed.

name: Phillip
text: Ordered flowers to be delivered to the funeral home on a Friday. The arrangement never made it. Then I received a notification hours after the funeral on Saturday stating that the flowers had been delivered. I attempted to contact the florist by phone but could never get through.

name: Rickesha Banks
text: This company has lost all values, morals and respect for its customers. I ordered a fruit basket that looked amazing,had a variety of fruits and well priced. Upon delivery I quickly realized I had been given the incorrect fruit basket.I quickly called House of Flowers to inform them of the mishap which was quickly retired to a text message to what I assumed would be to rectify my problem .I then again explained my concerns; which then an employee of this company informed me for better lack of words the photos are misleading,and basically depends on what's in stock when orders are being crafted .You will get what's given.I am very sorry I had to experience this type of customer service during the pandemic. This matter has not been resolved and I have been trying to upload our text conversations but unavailable.

resp.text: Our website states that we are allowed to make substitutions depending on availability of product as does all other websites.  The basket online was more expensive than what you ordered therefore yes there will be a difference in what you saw versus what was received.

name: Dianne
text: The arrangement of roses with the cupcake candles were gorgeous! My mother loved them! Thank you so much!! You really did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  It was our pleasure.

name: Tina Anderson
text: Great people to make arrangements with. I recommend them to anyone!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: I am so very disappointed in my experience with Valentine's Day flowers from here. Ordered a small bouquet to be delivered to my daughter at her work. Well it cost me $60.00. At 3:00 on Valentine's Day, she had still not gotten her flowers. I kept calling to check but phone was off the hook. I then left my job to go check on the order. When I got there they were very rude about the fact that I was there looking for the arrangement,  which was by the way on the floor at the front door with some of the flowers broken from being walked past, I assume as much. The lady did say they were trying to deliver as fast as possible, but you DONT deliver broken flowers. I took them with me and gave them to my daughter. Needless to say that will be the last time I use this florist.

resp.text: On any major holiday a specific time of delivery cannot be guaranteed.  orders are filled according to the order they are received.

name: Tina Riddlesprigger
text: I placed an online order for sympathy flowers. The flowers were never delivered. Four days after placing the order, and still no flowers, I had to send an email to have my money refunded. Very Bad Business

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  All orders placed on line are sent through FlowerShop network and all refunds they have to handle as well.

Keith Jewell

name: Walter Giles
text: The flowers were lovely for our 65th anniversary.  The only problem was our card saying what florist delivered them!  I called my daughter in Ohio and she told me Ronny’s.  I wanted to know so I could make sure to use yours from now only.  The one she had been using made terrible arrangements!  Thank you!  Make sure your card is in!  It’s good for your business!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Thank you for your compliments. We strive to be above and beyond when it comes to the quality floral arrangements we design. Please don’t hesitate to call on us! We consider it an honor to have the opportunity to serve you! Sorry for the missing card! We are Everyday Flowers by Ronny.

name: Marcia Lucas
text: I called directly as I live in Michigan to order sympathy flowers. Not only did they do an amazing job. I requested a picture and received it later that day. Thank you for doing a beautiful job!

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Marilyn Stagner
text: The flower arrangement for our friends funeral were beautiful  and just what we ordered. This will be our florist from now on!

resp.text: We appreciate you and your family! We consider it an honor to serve you on such a special order. Thank you for your business. Stop in and see us soon!

name: Joseph Robinson
text: Everything we get from here has always been beautiful. I will always use Everyday Flowers. Great job keep up the excellent work.

name: Natasha Wilson
text: Ronnie and his staff are very professional.  They aim to please

name: Melvina Naramore
text: They have a wonderful Florist Gregg working for them.

name: Kayla Ingram
text:
Gorgeous arrangements, quick and friendly service, considerate verbiage, all the way around perfect experience. 10/10.
Thank you so much.

name: Catherine “Catie” Currie
text:
I ordered flowers through a delivery service and they sent an email confirming the delivery, but the recipient had not received them. I called the 3rd party's customer service line and expected to be playing phone tag with a corporate office for days.

I did not expect to get a call from Ronny personally, who did all of the follow up himself and made sure that the delivery was made on his own time and well after his normal business hours. For someone who lives in a completely different state and had no way of following up myself, knowing someone cared this much that his flowers got to their intended destination on time made me feel like I was the most special person in the world.

Every time I have business in Clanton that calls for flowers, I'm not even going to bother with a 3rd party if I can help it. Not when I know this shop is there!

name: Susan Davis
text: Ronny captured everything floral my daughter wanted for her wedding. He came through with exactly what she wanted and more and his prices were reasonable too! I highly recommend him!!

name: Natalee Robinson
text: Every thing we have ordered from here has been absolutely gorgeous and exactly what we asked for!!

name: Travel with Wendy
text:
Really love this little lavender farm in Harvest, Alabama just north of Huntsville - Lori Wynde is so sweet and her lavender lemonade is so refreshing and different

She told us the lavender would be in bloom the first two weeks of June - so we are definitely heading back to do some self picking 🌻 fun

Her quaint little lavender shop inside has so many neat things that’s she’s created including dryer balls with essential oil, jewelry, soaps, lotions, balms and so much more. She even has some quilting that is really pretty. Great gift ideas

This is a great day trip in #northalabama 😍

name: Amie Furber
text: I had such a lovely experience making my lavender wreath last night. The hosts were incredibly hospitable, the lavender treats were delicious, and the end product will be enjoyed for years to come. Thank you for sharing your talents with our group of ladies.

resp.text: Thank you! So glad you had a nice experience!

name: Just_Nebula
text: It's such a nice area. The lavender is beautiful and they had bees flying around. That might be scary to some people but I absolutely love bees

name: Kristen U
text: I couldn't believe it! Lavender growing in the South! The rows and rows of lavender is absolutely beautiful. It was a dream to be out there enjoying the evening. I'm also very excited about the lavender wreath making workshops and other future events out on the farm! The farm fresh eggs are also fantastic.

resp.text: Thank you so much. Glad you were able to capture some of the beauty in your photos.

name: Jeff LaScola
text: so much fun... a simple quick family adventure

resp.text: We cant wait to share again next year!

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart

text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Tammy Willis
text: What an awesome company.  I received one of their bouquets as a gift from my son who lives in Huntsville.  When I visited him this past June, I wanted to go to their store and arrange another bouquet for my home and have it shipped.  They were so friendly, helpful and talented in helping me arrange the perfect bouquet and having it shipped to my home in California.  Upon my return home, I received my package and unfortunately, the Post Office was a little rough with my package and damaged some of the flowers.  Anthony at Paper Petals assured me they would take care of me and that they did!  They replaced the damaged flowers in a very timely manner with great communication throughout the process.  Awesome customer service and I will not hesitate to use them again.  Their flowers are incredible, life like and beautiful.  Best part, I don't have to water or worry about dying.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Tammy, we're so glad you had a good experience with us (and that your replacement bouquet arrived safely!) It was great having you visit our studio and we really enjoyed arranging your bouquet together for you!

name: G Dunn
text: Beautiful flowers in store. I took a class to make cherry blossoms. Thao was a great teacher and very patient with us all. Everyone made beautiful flowers! LOVE

resp.text: Thank you for attending the class! It was so fun working with everyone. And we agree, everyone's flowers turned out lovely!

name: Mary Hinson
text: I went to Paper Petals Co at Lowe Mill and picked up and Zinnia Kit along with a cute vase! The kit came with all the materials needed and a code to the video tutorial. All you need are a pair of scissors! My family had such a fun time making these flowers and we were so happy with how they all came out!

resp.text: The flower you created looks gorgeous, Mary! Thank you to you and your family for giving our Craft Box a try!

name: Anastacia LaRocco
text: I don't even know where to begin when it comes to singing their praise. They are amazing when it comes to communication and they go above and beyond for their customers. I left a resin flower in their care that my father had made before he passed and I have been so nervous but they treated it with great care. Because of them my dad still gets to walk me down the aisle and I couldn't ask for more. They more than delivered on my wedding flowers and I'm so grateful they will forever be a part of my special day. Thank you so SO much!

resp.text: Staci, we absolutely loved working with you and your family! And seeing everyone's reaction to all of our flowers, especially the incorporation of your father's resin flower, made the occasion even more special. Thank you for choosing us to create such a sentimental piece for your special day!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text:
I have followed Paper Petals Co. on social media for a couple of years now and have always wanted to order because their work is just so beautiful. I finally ordered two different items for Mother’s Day and WOW they did not disappoint! Absolutely stunning and detailed work! I am so happy with both bouquets. 10/10 Recommend!!

Also, the packing for the shipping was perfect and so well done! No concern about damage at all!

Everything I expected and more!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers for Mother's Day, Ashleigh! We're happy that you're happy with our flowers! We hope you and your loved ones will enjoy those flowers for years to come.

name: Bridget Brooke
text: We are in love with Thao's amazing work! My husband surprised me for our anniversary with a paper version of my flower crown from our wedding, and with the most adorable cherry blossoms for my birthday. We also sent a Mother's day bouquet that was absolutely gorgeous. I cannot say enough good things, and now want to fill my entire house with these gorgeous creations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bridget! We loved recreating your flower crown and the rest of your florals so we're so happy to hear they were well received!

name: Delilah Steen
text: I love the craft boxes. The single stem and bouquets are also really great for presents. Shipping is fast and beautifully packaged.

resp.text: We're always overjoyed to hear love for our Craft Boxes! Thank you, Delilah!

name: Shalin Mody
text: They have the most wonderfully crafted paper flower bouquets 🤩🌺😍! I've received compliment after complement for the paper flowers I've sent friends and loved ones.  Even better is the story behind the business.  We're very fortunate to have them in Huntsville 😁

resp.text: Thank you for your appreciation for our flowers, Shalin!! It was really a pleasure to chat with you when you stopped by the studio!

name: Ashim Shrestha
text: Absolutely beautiful flowers, with top-notch craftsmanship! Brilliant choices, and selections to chose from. I used them for my niece's birthday party theme, and she loved it so much that she ended up using them in her room. Thao was so easy to work with and made sure she knew exactly what I wanted. Couldn’t be happier, highly recommend!!

resp.text: This really means a lot that she continued to use them in her room after the party! Thank you for letting us be a part of her special day!

name: conbuom
text: This place is everything! The craftsmanship, attention to detail, it’s all gorgeous. And all of the interactions with them were super professional and friendly. Plus the owners have built this business organically - from the ground up! Which is another reason I love to support them. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy reading your review conbuom, thank you so much for your praise! We feel blessed to have your support, so thank you for following along with us on our paper flower journey!

name: Mika Middleton
text: all around amazing work and excellent customer care. I will be purchasing from them again and again.

resp.text: Thank you, Mika! We always look forward to when you stop by the studio!

name: M Dohr
text:
Coolest bouquet I’ve ever bought for  my gal.

She loved it and it will last .. timeless

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers!!

name: Mariah Johnson
text: We used Paper Petals for our wedding flowers. They were beautiful and we got so many compliments. They looked real!! The best part is we still have them for memories and decorations in our home. Thao was wonderful to work with. She listened to my vision and made it come to life. I would nightly recommend her flowers to anyone for any occasion! Well worth the money.

resp.text: Mariah, it was such a pleasure working with you to create your bridal bouquet!! For our flowers to be a part of your special day and knowing that they are still brightening up your home, that makes our day. Thank you so much for trusting us with your wedding flowers!

name: Jacklyn Parham
text: Excellent teacher beautiful flowers

resp.text: Thank you, Jacklyn!! We're glad you were able to join us for the classes!

name: Janet Elledge-Nauman
text: I purchased a bouquet for my niece.  When they arrived she said they were really beautiful and she was glad that they were made by a local artisan!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us local artists!!

name: Ishan B
text: Great selections of flowers at their location in Huntsville. Can be scented as well. Better to gift these flowers as they won't decay and  thrown out after few days and can always be nice decor anywhere you put them. I recommend 5/5.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by our studio. We're so glad to hear that you appreciate our forever flowers!

name: Kathleen N
text: During this strange chaotic time, I was looking for something to spark a sense of joy. I started in my venture of wanting to grow flowers/plants, but knowing I have a black thumb. As a result, I started looking into paper flowers. Instagram recommended Paper Petals Co. after some search, and I began reading up on the company’s mission statement. I will be honest and say, I also have a very soft spot for Asian women entrepreneurs who are thriving in their businesses. I am so excited to eventually get many more flowers, but I did send a bouquet to a friend and can’t wait to see my friend’s reaction. With that said, I am incredibly impressed by Thao’s talent, her passion for her work, and her kindness as a human. It’s been such a pleasure conversing with her, and I plan to continue supporting this business that brings so much happiness.

resp.text: Reading your words of kindness and encouragement have truly made our days, Kathleen! Thank you so much for all of the support you've given us and we cannot wait for you to one day visit our studio!

name: melissa nguyen
text: ppc is a really wholesome company. They’ve been so passionate about their work ever since the beginning and it shows. Their flowers are stunning and its totally worth a look !

resp.text: If our passion is visible through our work then we've succeeded! Thank you, Melissa!

name: Mariah Zielke
text: Thao’s flowers are so beautiful! The perfect dainty addition to my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Mariah!! We're happy that our flowers can be decorating your home!

name: Emaley Thomas
text:
I'd met the owner of this shop at an event & fell in love with her work. When I was walking through Lowe Mill one day I saw that she had opened up shop recently via her social media and I will forever be buying flowers from her.
The quality of work is unlike anything I've seen in paper flowers. You can tell not only by talking to her but by her attention to detail she is doing what she loves. The flowers are vibran, well-constructed,  and one of a kind. Will always come back to buy more.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your compliments, Emaley!! It is so good to hear that the little details are not going unnoticed, so thank you for your love for our flowers!

name: jean beasley
text: I’ve taken a couple of workshops from Thao (the owner). She is a great teacher! I enjoyed the workshop so much, I bought crepe paper, wire and pan pastels to make my own. (I’ve now taught my mom how to make crepe paper flowers.) I’ve also bought quite a few flowers from Thao to decorate my home. I love her flowers!

resp.text: Jean, it's always a pleasure anytime you stop by and we have a chance to work together! Thank you for spreading the love for paper flowers!

name: Priscillia Engelking
text: Beautiful handcrafted bouquets with colors even brighter than the pictures! The customer service and timely shipping is also great. I have purchased multiple bouquets for my house as well as gifts.

resp.text: It's been a joy putting together bouquets for you! Thank you for your support, Priscillia!

name: Brianna Haynes
text: I have purchased flowers multiple times and recently attended a workshop to create my own paper flower.  Thao's flowers are absolutely stunning. At times I have even forgotten that they aren't real.  The workshop was fun and informative.  The instruction was clear and easy to follow and the materials are excellent quality.  I will be attending more workshops in the future.

resp.text: It is a pleasure every time you visit the studio, Brianna! Thank you for all of your support!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
I found out that Paper Petals sells craft boxes and decided that I needed one ASAP before I ended up with cabin fever and a dead husband (I kid!)

I placed my order on Saturday and it was delivered Sunday. I cried, it’s honestly that exquisite, and such a welcome distraction from all that’s going on in our world today. I don’t have a creative bone in my body, but it’s been a lovely activity. Thank you so much, Thao!!

resp.text: Sunny, you are too sweet!! It really means a lot that my Craft Box could bring you such a good experience during this crazy time. Thank you so much!

name: Valerie DePalma
text: Their flowers are gorgeous and they have lots of different options to make bouquets or to purchase ones already made. If you don't live in Huntsville you can have them shipped as well and they'll come in perfect condition!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers, Valerie! We always try to have many different options for everyone to match any occasion, so we're glad you found the right arrangement here!

name: Salwa Jeries
text: Loved the peonies class, it was so much fun and super relaxing! Her works are beautiful and last forever!

resp.text: We're happy to know you found the workshop fun and relaxing, that is definitely our goal! Thank you for attending!

name: Sulav Darnal
text: Absolutely in love with The Paper Petals. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sulav!!

name: The Stever’s
text: Wonderful flowers 💐 truly love them but the price point is high

resp.text: Thank you for your review and we're happy to hear you love our flowers!

name: Claire Young
text: We loved the flower workshop! An afternoon well spent. We'll definitely go again!!

resp.text: It was great having you attend our workshop and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Martin Nguyen
text: Beautiful work!!! High quality people and products!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Martin!

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Will Hallman
text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

name: Chris H
text: Cool shop with more than just flowers. They were a great help and put together a nice bouquet last minute.

name: Audra Williams
text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

name: Jn F. Turner
text: I received roses for Valentines day from my husband he was very disappointed at the arrangement looked really cheap and nothing like the picture arrangement he saw online.  You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

name: Senior HelpersNEO
text: I ordered an arrangement from Joy's for the first time a few days ago, and my experience was amazing. The hydrangeas were beautiful and the staff was very helpful. They were able to fulfill my order in a few short hours (for a great price). I highly recommend Joy's, they take great care of their customers, and their flowers are of great quality! You will not be disappointed. Five stars

name: Courtney Moon
text: Ordered an arrangement online for a funeral. Extremely disappointed and shocked when I actually saw the arrangement. Much much smaller in person.  Absolutely wasn't worth the price paid. Would not recommend ordering online. Will not be ordering again.

name: Robert Owens
text: Ok.   Not the warmest reception.   Will try somewhere else next time.

name: Craig Bowman
text: Wonderful experience there

name: Lanicsha W
text: Overall the service from this business was exceptional, I was pleased with both the delivery and the quality of the floral arrangement. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone.

name: Kristen Frost
text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

name: Kayla Rose
text: Beautiful arrangement. Great price. Fast friendly delivery.

name: Viv Pace
text: Very poor customer service skills taking order by phone giving cryptic answers as if uninterested. It's easier to simply go elsewhere.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear this. We will take note of this and make sure to do a better job. I am truly sorry that you were not happy with your experience. If there is anything we can do to make it better, please feel free to call 256-546-6381 and ask for Kristen.

name: Shanell Taylor
text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Nice atmosphere for a floral shop great decor with all kinds of items to decorate your home with. From hand painted vases to a refinished dresser for sale. Lady who worked there was very and helpful. She helped me decide on a bouquet for a friends birthday. Will be back to order more flowers for this Valetines Day!

name: C. Bos
text: We count on Joy's flowers to keep beautiful arrangements on Mom's table for every special day. They accommodate special requests as best they can with the flowers they have. Our mom loves pink. :)

name: Crystal Grochola
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and gift shop. Such wonderful people who work there and overall great prices. I will be using them again. Love Joy's .....

name: Jessie Miller
text: My corsage for prom was horrible put together the rose fell off 30 mins of wearing it (thank god I had done senior lead out already) and the baby breath flow had out even bloomed yet and we paid 36.00$ so I give you  a 1

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that. We will be in touch with you soon in hopes that we can do something to make this better. Is there a name other than Jessie Miller that your order would be under?

name: Jay P
text: This is at least the 4th year I have ordered from Joy's and my sister loves the arrangements and baskets I send her from here.  This time I spoke with Tiffany and she was bright, pleasant and knowledgeable.  We were able for me to visualize a similar arrangement online  My former wife's family was in the flower business here in South Florida for decades and I appreciate good service and great arrangements and Joy's does it extremely well.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Love this shop. I walk in and they know exactly what I want and my name. Recommend highly. They rap the roses anyway I ask.

name: Kathryn Ballard
text: Excellent service, reasonable prices, and high quality in the snack basket that I ordered. I would highly recommend Joy's...

name: Gene Walker
text: I ordered funeral arrangement and it was not delivered even after being told it had been when I checked the morning of service. Then they were suppose to have a plant delivered to the home of the mother of deceased and has been 2 days and still no plant. I live out of state and called the florist (Joys) myself. Will not use nor recommend them ever again.

name: Laura Singleton
text: VERY EASY TO ORDER ONLINE AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED TO GET AN EMAIL ADVISING ONCE ORDER HAD BEEN DELIVERED

name: Kelsey Todd
text: I got an email saying the flowers were delivered to my friend and she never received them. Hoping this will be fixed, but I am very unsatisfied right now. They were delivered after store hours with no way to figure out what happened so I am super upset. :(

name: C.Eric. Holcomb
text: Wonderful place to find the flowers that you want for that special someone.

name: Tonya Mayhall
text: It was so easy to order and when I called the person I spoke with was so nice

name: Colleen Reed
text: My daughter was very happy with her beautiful flowers!

name: Craig Boose
text: Very embarrassed with the pitiful arrangement i ordered.  Never again will I use this florist.

name: ethan johnson
text: Best florist in Etowah County!! Hands down

name: David Stamps
text: One of the best.

name: Terri Webb
text: Love the employees and their work

name: Edwin Smith
text: Joy"s is Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Montez Barker
text: Great gift

name: Regina Vinson Ford
text: Very rude

name: Teisha Johnson
text: Beautiful arrangements and beautiful gifts!!

name: Donna S
text: Great service with fresh flowers

name: David Robertson
text: We visited Dukes Barber Shop. It's attached to the florist. Duke is awesome. Very fast and efficient. And inexpensive. Does a great job every time.

name: Faye Dukes
text: Lisa was just wonderful and made a beautiful arrangement for my grandfather's funeral.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Amanda Ford
text: Wonderful place to get all your flower needs. Great owner and staff very helpful and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you Amanda.

name: Jim Kelley
text: Haircut next door reason able

name: val lamar
text: Nice shop,lots to choose from.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Paul Collier
text: At the Barber shop $5  its hard to beet

resp.text: Thank you.

name: LISA JONES
text: Beautiful arrangments.

name: Brandon Combs
text: Flower

resp.text: Thank you

name: Ashley
text: I called James (owner) at 8:30am and asked him to prepare an arrangement for a funeral service at 3:00pm the same day. Not only was he willing to entertain my request, he did it with grace and kindness. He explained what he had available and what he could do in the time period he had and assured me everything would be taken care of. In a time like this, being able to have someone take care of things for you with kindness was much appreciated. I’ll be using The Flower Shop again and recommending it to others!

name: Doris Sanders
text: The flowers James did for my Mom were amazing. He saw our vision of what we wanted and got it perfect. My boys wanted pink roses for their Grandmother and it was beautiful. I highly recommend them. My picture does not do justice to the arrangements.

name: Nazmi Naziya
text: I ordered flowers for my father in law at the last minute from Washington state. I told her exactly what I wanted and that I needed them to be delivered on the same day. She was so helpful and kind. My father in law loved the flowers...they exceeded my expectation greatly. The flowers were fresh and arranged beautifully!

name: Missy Ray
text: Ordered a funeral spray from here for the first time & it was gorgeous.  Received many compliments.  It was done just as I had asked for.

name: Thermyn King-Jones
text: Extremely friendly southern hospitality. Best flower shop I have ever been too.

name: Kambrey Beasley
text: My grandmother works here so I just wanted to rate this a 5

name: D Lord
text: James was very helpful when I ordered flowers for my dad’s service.  I was very pleased with the flowers.

name: Chris Pittson
text: Best flower shop in Alabama. 5 STARS

name: Heather Croom
text: The owner is very kind and responsive! The arrangement was gorgeous! Can’t beat his prices!

name: David Saylors
text: After buying flowers for 10 years from this shop. I stopped to get the usual fresh flower bouquet for my wife for the National Cemetary.  It usually takes about 15 minutes.  But today they did not have time they were to busy. I know it was a busy flower weekend with Mother’s Day being on Sunday.  But really that’s two days away.  The lesson learned.  I found another flower shop in Alabaster and  was able to purchase the bouquet with no problem.  I will not be returning to this business.  There are many alternatives and I’m sure they will not miss my 6-7 purchases per year.  You lost a repeat customer for good.  I encourage any Veteran to look elsewhere for flowers.

name: Sj Ferrell
text: Memorial arrangement for the Urn was top notch and exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend trusting her artistic  vision for your event or personal floral arrangement. Reasonably priced and friendly staff.

name: Becky Presley
text:
They could not have been kinder when helping us decide on flowers for my Father's arrangement. So helpful and knowledgeable of what would work for us since service would be local but burial would be a good distance away...Mr Smith even offered to call me if any of the flowers we requested were not available so we could decide on a
replacement.

name: C Lynn Bacon
text: This is a fantastic florist!  They do excellent work. I recently needed a standing spray for a funeral.  It was done exceptionally well, with careful attention to just the right colors.  The flowers were fresh and gorgeous. I will be using The Flower Shop again when I have floral needs, and I highly recommend this establishment to others.

name: Cynthia Winegard
text: Awesome! Always willing to make sure the customers are happy and tell you how much they appreciate your business!

name: Jim Chomicz
text: Elizabeth and staff did a beautiful job with the flowers for our wedding. We described what we wanted and they were perfect...better than our description. What made it even better was the price...very, very reasonable.

name: Michael H (Hamp)
text: Beautiful arrangements, outstanding customer service. Stopped by to take some flowers to my in-laws grave at the National Cemetery. The store was closed but they saw us look in the window;  as they were in the shop they made us an arrangement on the spot.

name: Cheryl Hall
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and they do beautiful work. I have utilized this flower shop for many, many years. I have never seen a bad looking flower ever. Elizabeth the owner will give the most beautiful arrangement. She also has reasonable prices and is very caring about her flowers. She knows the rules of the National Vet cemetery and most of the cemeteries in the area. I would not chose another florist at all. Matter-of-fact I have used The Flower Shop to do business with even for flowers in my own state of Maryland. It seems as though there are very few within my area.

name: Jason Quarles
text: I recently ordered a funeral spray and have heard from several people in attendance that the flowers were beautiful. Thank you!

name: bella da
text:
Not the friendliest place. Walking in, only one employee out of two greeted the customer, and that greeting was given from the back of the store. The second person never said anything and never looked up. The flowers were just OK. They didn't have much in stock, and didn't have single boxes for long stemmed flowers.....wasn't upscale....could have gone to Walmart or Publix for the roses and a nicer card.

We came in last year and the same younger woman didn't speak and wasn't very friendly.The positive reviews are most likely from friends or long-time Montevallo residents who know them well. Won't be back again.

name: John Fowler
text: They were very helpful when I called to order flowers to be delivered to a family member's funeral service. They knew the rules of the Alabama National Cemetary regarding permitted flower arrangments and were able to help me pick something nice that would work there, and for the price they're delivering a very nice arrangment. Would use them again.

name: Elliott Varner
text:
So.... I was told by the owner of Tiger Lilly that he did his job and those flowers and exactly what I ordered. He then went on to tell me he went above and beyond by upgrading the vase and adding a bow. He then tells me that it isn't fair to him for me to bash him on social media. The post is on tiger Lilly's Facebook page under community comments. I am yet to see where I bashed him. Then he continues to inform me how you just cant make some people happy. Not one time did he offer any reparations, exchanges, refunds, discounts, or even an apology. So that's my experience with Slade Carden and Tiger Lilly.
When I pointed out that he had not apologized he offered a half hearted apology. I cancelled my other orders and will not do business here again.
